description: Using secure channels, Sofiya coordinates with reformists to assess public sentiment and strategize messaging around governance transparency.
Tensions grow as public debates on governance reform gain momentum, with increasing pressure from citizens to address surveillance concerns.
Halden's diaries are leaked, revealing his contemplations on democratic governance, igniting a wave of public support for systemic reform.
Sofiya establishes a network of allies within the Directorate, leveraging Halden's insights to promote a vision for reduced surveillance without sacrificing security.
A robust public movement emerges, demanding transparency and democratic governance reforms, fueled by the revelations of Halden's vision.
Council members convene to address the intensifying pressure for reform, tasking a committee to explore governance models allowing for increased transparency.
